name: Waterguns.io
description:
Waterguns.io is a beach arena shooter inspired by minecraft. In this wet, blocky multiplayer shooter, you're on a beach arena surrounded by people who want nothing more than to soak you with waterguns! Get to the top of the leaderboard by being the number one soaker, or just get soaked! 

How to Play Waterguns.io

Use the WASD keys or arrow keys to move. 

Right click to shoot. 

Left mouse to activate shield.
